snippet: New measures should help reduce litigation, but more substantive reforms are needed.
abstract: Editorial supports proposals in both House and Senate that would restrict abusive patent litigation that takes aim at small and medium-sized businesses; asserts these new measures should reduce litigation, but more substantive reforms are needed to directly address the underlying problem of vague and overbroad patents.
lead_paragraph: New measures should help reduce litigation, but more substantive reforms are needed.

headline.main: Congress Takes on Abusive Patent Suits
headline.print_headline: Congress Takes On Abusive Patent Suits
